p: At 21 day's post-inoculation (dpi), five of the mock-vaccinated calves in Group 1 (D1-1 to D1-5) and five of the calves vaccinated with the LSD-RVF.mf construct in Group 2 (A1-1 to A1-5) were challenged with 2.0 ml of LSDV_WB at a titer of 5.0 × 10 4 TCID 50/ml, clustered at two sites SC, and 2.0 ml intravenously (IV) at a titer of 5.0 × 10 5 TCID 50/ml.
